title: Pittsburg Studio in-law unit with private Bath Near Freeway and BART
posting_body: Studio in-law unit with small kitchen area(sink, small stove and full fridge), full private bathroom and separate entrance in Pittsburg near Pittsburg High School.
Close to new Pittsburg Center BART station.
Garbage included, tenant pays for all other utilities.
Close to BART, freeway, grocery, park, schools.
Two windows, plenty of cabinets/closets for storage, ceiling fan and window AC.
Great for single professional who takes BART or freeway.
No washer/dryer or laundry hookups.
Street parking only.
Available immediately.
$1800 security deposit.
No pets, no smoking, need good credit with no negative/derogatory items, verifiable income at least $2700 and great verifiable rental history.
Please email for more details or to schedule a showing.
Please provide the following information in your email --
1.Why are you moving
2.When are you looking to move
3.How is your credit
How is your rental history
5.Is your total monthly household income at least 3 times the rent
Do you have any pets
7.Do you do any illegal drugs or marijuana or have any criminal history
Who will the occupants be
Are you looking to stay long term

After viewing the rental, if you apply, can we run your credit reports and can you provide - verifiable documents showing income and rent payments, and rental reference phone numbers for all past and current rentals
